VALIDATE.MIN_STRING: '%s' should not be shorter than {{min_value}} characters.
VALIDATE.MAX_STRING: '%s' should not be longer than {{max_value}} characters.

VALIDATE.MAX_ARRAY: The item of '%s' should not be more than {{max_value}}.

VALIDATE.EMPTY_ARRAY: Do not pass an empty array.
